hero.title: Welcome to OfKors European Bakery!
hero.body: We are dedicated to bringing fresh, high-quality baked goods and meals directly to your table. Enjoy a taste of authentic European flavors with every bite.

service_1.title: Baked Goods
service_1.body: Enjoy a selection of freshly baked croissants, brioche rolls, and more, crafted daily with the finest ingredients.

service_2.title: Hot Foods
service_2.body: Indulge in savory crepes, pelmeni, borscht, and other seasonal soups, all made with love and tradition.

service_3.title: Desserts
service_3.body: Satisfy your sweet tooth with our cakes, cannolis, eclairs, and other delightful pastries.

food.title: Serving Fresh and Flavorful Meals
food.body_title: Discover a variety of breakfast and lunch options made fresh daily
food.body: From savory egg crepes with salmon or bacon to sweet fruit-filled crepes, our menu offers something for everyone. Enjoy a warm bowl of borsht, perfectly crispy chebureki, or traditional pelmeni. Each dish is crafted with care to bring the comfort of home cooking to your table.
